nameAvailable.name: nameAvailable
nameAvailable.description: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken or invalid and cannot be used.

reason.name: reason
reason.description: Gets the reason that a storage account name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if NameAvailable is false.

message.name: message
message.description: Gets an error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.

CustomDomain.name: CustomDomain
CustomDomain.description: The custom domain assigned to this storage account. This can be set via Update.

name.name: name
name.description: Gets or sets the custom domain name. Name is the CNAME source.

useSubDomain.name: useSubDomain
useSubDomain.description: Indicates whether indirect CName validation is enabled. Default value is false. This should only be set on updates

Encryption.name: Encryption
Encryption.description: The encryption settings on the account.

services.name: services
services.description: Gets the services which are encrypted.

keySource.name: keySource
keySource.description: Gets the encryption keySource(provider). Possible values (case-insensitive):  Microsoft.Storage

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: A boolean indicating whether or not the service is encrypted.

lastEnabledTime.name: lastEnabledTime
lastEnabledTime.description: Gets a time value indicating when was the encryption enabled by the user last time. We return this value only when encryption is enabled. There might be some unencrypted blobs which were written after this time. This time is just to give a rough estimate of when encryption was enabled.

Endpoints.name: Endpoints
Endpoints.description: The URIs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue or table object.

Sku.name: Sku
Sku.description: The SKU of the storage account.

name.name: name
name.description: Gets or sets the sku name. Required for account creation, optional for update. Note that in older versions, sku name was called accountType.

tier.name: tier
tier.description: Gets the sku tier. This is based on the SKU name.

StorageAccountCheckNameAvailabilityParam.name: StorageAccountCheckNameAvailabilityParameters
StorageAccountCheckNameAvailabilityParam.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

StorageAccountCreateParameters.name: StorageAccountCreateParameters
StorageAccountCreateParameters.description: The parameters to provide for the created account.

sku.name: sku
sku.description: Required. Gets or sets the sku type.

kind.name: kind
kind.description: Required. Indicates the type of storage account.

location.name: location
location.description: Required. Gets or sets the location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The geo region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geo region is specified on update the request will succeed.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.

StorageAccountKey.name: StorageAccountKey
StorageAccountKey.description: An access key for the storage account.

value.name: value
value.description: Base 64 encoded value of the key.

keys.name: keys
keys.description: Gets the list of account keys and their properties.

StorageAccountListResult.name: StorageAccountListResult
StorageAccountListResult.description: The list storage accounts operation response.

value.name: value
value.description: Gets the list of storage accounts and their properties.

provisioningState.name: provisioningState
provisioningState.description: Gets the status of the storage account at the time the operation was called.

primaryEndpoints.name: primaryEndpoints
primaryEndpoints.description: Gets the URLs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue or table object.Note that StandardZRS and PremiumLRS accounts only return the blob endpoint.

primaryLocation.name: primaryLocation
primaryLocation.description: Gets the location of the primary for the storage account.

statusOfPrimary.name: statusOfPrimary
statusOfPrimary.description: Gets the status indicating whether the primary location of the storage account is available or unavailable.

lastGeoFailoverTime.name: lastGeoFailoverTime
lastGeoFailoverTime.description: Gets the timestamp of the most recent instance of a failover to the secondary location. Only the most recent timestamp is retained. This element is not returned if there has never been a failover instance. Only available if the accountType is StandardGRS or StandardRAGRS.

secondaryLocation.name: secondaryLocation
secondaryLocation.description: Gets the location of the geo replicated secondary for the storage account. Only available if the accountType is StandardGRS or StandardRAGRS.

statusOfSecondary.name: statusOfSecondary
statusOfSecondary.description: Gets the status indicating whether the secondary location of the storage account is available or unavailable. Only available if the accountType is StandardGRS or StandardRAGRS.

creationTime.name: creationTime
creationTime.description: Gets the creation date and time of the storage account in UTC.

customDomain.name: customDomain
customDomain.description: Gets the user assigned custom domain assigned to this storage account.

secondaryEndpoints.name: secondaryEndpoints
secondaryEndpoints.description: Gets the URLs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue or table object from the secondary location of the storage account. Only available if the accountType is StandardRAGRS.

encryption.name: encryption
encryption.description: Gets the encryption settings on the account. If unspecified the account is unencrypted.

accessTier.name: accessTier
accessTier.description: The access tier used for billing. Access tier cannot be changed more than once every 7 days (168 hours). Access tier cannot be set for StandardLRS, StandardGRS, StandardRAGRS, or PremiumLRS account types.

customDomain.name: customDomain
customDomain.description: User domain assigned to the storage account. Name is the CNAME source. Only one custom domain is supported per storage account at this time. To clear the existing custom domain, use an empty string for the custom domain name property.

encryption.name: encryption
encryption.description: Provides the encryption settings on the account. If left unspecified the account encryption settings will remain. The default setting is unencrypted.

accessTier.name: accessTier
accessTier.description: Required for StandardBlob accounts. The access tier used for billing. Access tier cannot be changed more than once every 7 days (168 hours). Access tier cannot be set for StandardLRS, StandardGRS, StandardRAGRS, or PremiumLRS account types.

customDomain.name: customDomain
customDomain.description: User domain assigned to the storage account. Name is the CNAME source. Only one custom domain is supported per storage account at this time. To clear the existing custom domain, use an empty string for the custom domain name property.

encryption.name: encryption
encryption.description: Provides the encryption settings on the account. The default setting is unencrypted.

accessTier.name: accessTier
accessTier.description: The access tier used for billing. Access tier cannot be changed more than once every 7 days (168 hours). Access tier cannot be set for StandardLRS, StandardGRS, StandardRAGRS, or PremiumLRS account types.

StorageAccountRegenerateKeyParameters.name: StorageAccountRegenerateKeyParameters
StorageAccountRegenerateKeyParameters.description: Specifies name of the key which should be regenerated. key1 or key2 for the default keys

StorageAccountUpdateParameters.name: StorageAccountUpdateParameters
StorageAccountUpdateParameters.description: The parameters to provide for the updated account.

sku.name: sku
sku.description: Gets or sets the sku type. Note that sku cannot be updated to StandardZRS or ProvisionedLRS, nor can accounts of that sku type be updated to any other value.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.

currentValue.name: currentValue
currentValue.description: Gets the current count of the allocated resources in the subscription.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Gets the maximum count of the resources that can be allocated in the subscription.

name.name: name
name.description: Gets the name of the type of usage.

value.name: value
value.description: Gets or sets the list Storage Resource Usages.

value.name: value
value.description: Gets a string describing the resource name.

localizedValue.name: localizedValue
localizedValue.description: Gets a localized string describing the resource name.

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

methods.description: Checks that account name is valid and is not in use.
Lists all the storage accounts available under the subscription. Note that storage keys are not returned; use the ListKeys operation for this.
Gets the current usage count and the limit for the resources under the subscription.

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription.

methods.description: Lists all the storage accounts available under the given resource group. Note that storage keys are not returned; use the ListKeys operation for this.
Returns the properties for the specified storage account including but not limited to name, account type, location, and account status. The ListKeys operation should be used to retrieve storage keys.
Deletes a storage account in Microsoft Azure.

The update operation can be used to update the account type, encryption, or tags for a storage account. It can also be used to map the account to a custom domain. Only one custom domain is supported per storage account and. replacement/change of custom domain is not supported. In order to replace an old custom domain, the old value must be cleared/unregistered before a new value may be set. Update of multiple properties is supported. This call does not change the storage keys for the account. If you want to change storage account keys, use the regenerate keys operation.  The location and name of the storage account cannot be changed after creation.

Asynchronously creates a new storage account with the specified parameters. If an account is already created and subsequent create request is issued with different properties, the account properties will be updated. If an account is already created and subsequent create or update request is issued with exact same set of properties, the request will succeed.

accountName.name: accountName
accountName.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

methods.description: Lists the access keys for the specified storage account.
Regenerates the access keys for the specified storage account.
